name: Super Holobunnies: Pause Café
description: The Holobunnies (a group of hologram bunnies) pass the time on their sweet little home planet by battling each other to see who's the strongest in Brawler mode. They challenge themselves in boss battle simulations to hone their fighting skills in Boss Rush mode. Unbeknownst to them though, something terrible is about to happen - and their friend, Kitcat is on a quest to share dire news with the Holobunnies in the level-based runner campaign, Kitcat's Adventure. Super Holobunnies: Pause Café is filled with fun, challenge, and competition, and depicts the lives of the Holobunnies before embarking on their bittersweet adventure.
